message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split. You get 40, I get 60.
I'll take a 50/50 split. It's a fair offer, right?
I think we can do better than 50/50. Let's go with 65/35, I take 65, you take 35. It's still a fair split given the changing value of the money.
I'll take a larger share now, considering the inflation. 80/20 seems reasonable to me.
